content: **about** the rustic cottage dishcloth collection was inspired by our 1902 vacation cabin each dishcloth features a classic textured stitch framed with a contrasting garter edge **skills required** these dishcloths are an easy project suitable for a beginning knitter the textured stitches are created from simple repeating patterns of knit and purl stitches **measurements** finished cloths are approximately 7 25 18 5 cm square when knit at a gauge of 5 stitches and 6 row per inch **materials** us 7 4 5mm knitting needles worsted weight cotton yarn approximately 1 oz 30g or 50 yards 45m per cloth models are knit from herrschner s village yarns craft cotton in the following colours cream parsley blueberry apple red and lemon ice
